	Customer-focused mindset

Downstream Sales Officer Job at Catilas Resources Limited




        
    

        
        Catilas Resources Limited is an outsourcing and advisory services Company. Our focus is to help our clients leverage their core capabilities to optimize market opportunities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Downstream Sales Officer

Job Location: Warri, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Downstream Sales Officer is responsible for promoting and selling refined petroleum products (e.g., PMS, AGO, DPK, lubricants, LPG) to retail outlets, commercial clients, and industrial customers.
	The role involves developing customer relationships, identifying business opportunities, negotiating contracts, and ensuring effective product delivery and customer satisfaction in line with company goals.


Responsibilities


	Identify and engage prospective customers within assigned territory or market segment.
	Promote and sell downstream petroleum products including lubricants, fuels, and gas.
	Maintain strong relationships with existing clients to ensure repeat business and referrals.
	Negotiate pricing, payment terms, and delivery schedules in accordance with company policies.
	Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customers’ needs to adjust sales strategies.
	Collaborate with logistics and operations teams to ensure timely product delivery.
	Track sales targets and prepare periodic sales reports and forecasts.
	Ensure customer compliance with credit and payment terms.
	Resolve customer complaints and provide after-sales support as needed.
	Represent the company at trade shows, exhibitions, and networking events where necessary.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.
	2–5 years of relevant experience in downstream petroleum sales or B2B sales in a related industry.
	Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
	Knowledge of petroleum products, pricing structures, and supply chain operations.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite; experience with CRM tools is an advantage.


Desirable Attributes:


	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Negotiation and persuasive selling abilities
	Customer-focused mindset
	Analytical and problem-solving skills
	Self-motivated and goal-oriented
	Team collaboration.


Benefits
Competitive salary.
